banner.draft: [AT] Prequalify and submit your proposal before the call for proposals closes.
banner.submitted: [AT] Application under consideration. Communication with the customer - in the request chat.

action.title: [AT] Apply for prequalification / NDA
action.text: [AT] Make sure that the application contains a complete set of documents. It is not possible to change an application after it has been submitted.

description.title: [AT] Description and documents
description.notice: [AT] Familiarize yourself with the requirements of the Customer on the "Request" tab

registries.title: Onboarding
registries.text: To submit a bid, it is required to be onboarded in these Vendor Pools:

banner.changing: Submit a modified bid. The customer is considering your previous bid.
banner.draft: Submit a bid before the end for bids submission
banner.submitted: Change the bid to increase the chance of winning.
banner.summarize: Update the documents in the "Commercial offer and documentation" section

title.true: Price of your proposal, incl. VAT
title.false: Price of your proposal, excl. VAT

documents.title: Quotation and documentation
documents.text: You can also attach documents after receiving bids

competitors_ahead.true: Competitors are ahead of you on some positions

alternative.title: Alternative bid
alternative.info: To start preparing an alternative bid, click the button below.

nonexistent.title: My bid
nonexistent.info: Request completed, Bid submission not possible

refused.title: Your company has refused to submit bid
refused.sub_title:
You can return to the request and submit a bid
before the deadline for accepting bids {{value}}

blocked.title: The customer excluded you from the request
blocked.sub_title:
You cannot submit bids at the discretion of the customer.
To clarify the details, contact the customer

confirm_recall_dialog.title: Cancel the bid?
confirm_recall_dialog.text:
This bid will be unavailable to the customer and other vendors.
Bid can be edited and submitted again before the end of submission period

esg.title: Sustainable growth of your business
esg.text: Certify and get your ESG vendor status
